title: BTS 俾美國 YouTuber 笑係女團

replies.msg:
K-pop band BTS have been dubbed a ‘lesbian pop group’ in a shocking outburst from a Youtuber who also claimed they ‘ruined the AMAs’. The Youtuber went on a bizarre rant on Twitter, sharing several posts on his thoughts on the K-pop band – including one where he said BTS stands for ‘Band That Sucks.’ He then made shocking homophobic comments, sharing an image of the band alongside the caption: ‘Meet the Korean lesbian pop group BTS.’ He later called for them to ‘apologise for ruining the AMAs.’

BTS stands for Band That Sucks. t.co/N7yh9MXBy8 — Mark Dice (@MarkDice) November 21, 2017

Meet the Korean lesbian pop group BTS featured at the American Music Awards #AMAs last night. t.co/1TlgYeSUIy pic.twitter.com/7GuuBfItyA — Mark Dice (@MarkDice) November 21, 2017

@bts_bighit @BTS_twt When are you going to publicly apologize for ruining the #AMAs last night? — Mark Dice (@MarkDice) November 21, 2017

He also mocked fans who set up a petition to get him sued for defamation, saying:

‘Only 5000 signatures? @bts_bighit fans are weak! t.co/koA35RRp2J — Mark Dice (@MarkDice) November 22, 2017

His derogatory comments were met with shock and disgust from fans, but given the popularity of the band it’s clear he’s just trying to be controversial and stir up reactions.

Jeez, I just wondered why girl group from South Korea was featured at the #AMAs and their fans just went nuts. I didn't even mention that their music sounds like dying rat stuck in a trap out by the dumpster. — Mark Dice (@MarkDice) November 20, 2017

The band are yet to comment on the derogatory messages, but hopefully they’ll decide it’s not worth their time.
